## Examples

```js
const days = Array.from({ length: 31 }, (_, i) => i + 1).map(String);
const months = Array.from({ length: 12 }, (_, i) => i + 1).map(String);
const years = Array.from({ length: 100 }, (_, i) => (new Date).getFullYear() - i).sort().map(String);
<Form form="form-example1" layout="horizontal" onSubmit={logger.log}>
    <Form.Item label="Name">
        <Form.Field name="name" placeholder="Full name" />
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item label="Age">
        <Form.Field name="age" widget={NumberWidget} />
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item label="Password" help="Minimum 8 characters">
        <Form.Field name="password" type="password" />
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item label="Date of birth">
        <Col span={3}>
            <Form.Field
                name="dob.day"
                widget={
                    <Select>
                        {days.map(day =>
                            <Select.Option key={day} value={day}>{day}</Select.Option>
                        )}
                    </Select>
                }
            />
        </Col>
        <Col span={3} push={1}>
            <Form.Field
                name="dob.month"
                widget={
                    <Select>
                        {months.map(month =>
                            <Select.Option key={month} value={month}>{month}</Select.Option>
                        )}
                    </Select>
                }
            />
        </Col>
        <Col span={3} push={2}>
            <Form.Field
                name="dob.year"
                widget={
                    <Select>
                        {years.map(year =>
                            <Select.Option key={year} value={year}>{year}</Select.Option>
                        )}
                    </Select>
                }
            />
        </Col>
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item fullWidth>
        <Form.ButtonBar
            leftButtons={<Form.Button type="danger" action="ACTION_DELETE">Delete</Form.Button>}
            rightButtons={[
                <Form.Button key="save-and-cont">Save &amp; Continue Editing</Form.Button>,
                <Form.Button key="save" type="primary">SAVE</Form.Button>,
            ]}
        />
    </Form.Item>
</Form>
```

**Nested Forms**

```js
<Form form="form-example1" layout="horizontal" onSubmit={logger.log}>
    <Form.Item label="Name">
        <Form.Field name="name" placeholder="Full name" />
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item label="Age">
        <Form.Field name="age" widget={NumberWidget} />
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item label="Address">
        <Form>
            <Form.Item>
                <Form.Field name="address1" placeholder="address1" />
            </Form.Item>
            <Form.Item>
                <Form.Field name="address2" placeholder="address2" />
            </Form.Item>
            <Form.Item>
                <Form.Field name="postcode" placeholder="postcode" />
            </Form.Item>
        </Form>
    </Form.Item>
    <Form.Item fullWidth>
        <Form.ButtonBar
            rightButtons={[
                <Form.Button htmlType="submit" type="primary">SAVE</Form.Button>,
            ]}
        />
    </Form.Item>
</Form>
```

**Layout**

Change layout with `layout` prop.

```js
initialState = { layout: 'inline' };
<div>
    <Form form="form-example2" layout={state.layout} onSubmit={logger.log}>
        <Form.Item label="Name">
            <Form.Field name="name" placeholder="Full name" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="Password">
            <Form.Field name="password" type="password" placeholder="Password" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item>
            <Form.Button htmlType="login">Login</Form.Button>
        </Form.Item>
    </Form>
    <Button
        style={{ marginTop: 20 }}
        onClick={() => setState(state => ({ layout: state.layout === 'inline' ? 'horizontal' : 'inline' }))}
        size="small"
        type="dashed"
    >
        Toggle {state.layout === 'inline' ? 'horizontal' : 'inline'} layout
    </Button>
</div>
```
